meanings.definition: An amount to be paid for an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: The premiums for my car insurance are due at the end of the month.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't afford the high premiums for health insurance.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot offered to pay the premiums with shiny coins.
meanings.sent4: The premiums for peace of mind are priceless.
meanings.sent5: Paying the premiums on time ensures coverage when needed.

meanings.definition: A sum added to an ordinary price or charge.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant bill included a service charge and premiums for the special dessert.
meanings.sent2: The premiums for expedited shipping were worth the extra cost.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream shop offered free toppings as premiums for large cones.
meanings.sent4: The premiums on luxury items can quickly add up.
meanings.sent5: Including premiums in the total cost can sometimes be misleading.

meanings.definition: A high-value item given as a reward or incentive.
meanings.sent1: Winning the competition earned her a beautiful necklace as a premium.
meanings.sent2: The company offered a premium to employees who exceeded their sales targets.
meanings.sent3: The premium for winning the race was a shiny trophy.
meanings.sent4: The premium for loyalty was a special gift from the company.
meanings.sent5: Receiving a premium for hard work is always motivating.
